thread.title: Roads: A55 closed after 'serious collisions'
thread.title_full: Roads: A55 closed after 'serious collisions' | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Roads: A55 closed after 'serious collisions'
text:
NWPControlroom @NWPControlroom Follow A collision on the A55, Caergeiliog J3, means the road will be closed in both directions for some time.
08:53 - 15 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite The Air Ambulance has just left the scene of two serious collisions on the A55 Westbound between J4 Llanfihangel and J3 Valley.
The road has been closed in both directions to allow the North West Air Ambulance to attend the scene.
Last updated Thu 15 Oct 2015 Read more 3 updates Crashes close A55 in north Wales Travel North Wales Anglesey A55 Wales
